clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.ClassRelease.description:
Description

clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.ClassRelease
Check for sending ‘retain’, ‘release’, or ‘autorelease’ directly to a Class.
The
clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.ClassRelease
check is an alias, please see
Clang Static Analyzer Available Checkers
for more information.
clang-analyzer-osx.cocoa.ClassRelease.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
